moves.6... Nxb4 7. a3 Nc6 8. e4: ?! Hoping to get in d4 but closes position making Bishop pair less effective.
moves.10... Qb8: Black plans on opening the b file; I underestimated the speed and effectiveness of the plan.
moves.15. d3 Rab8 16. Bb2: Defensive now Black gets a clear edge.
moves.16... Rb7 17. f4: ? At this point I realized Black had a strong advantage. This was more desperation, but weakens white further.
moves.17... Rfb8 18. f5 Bd7: At this point the GK Computer gives a .78 advantage to Black.
moves.19. Nc3: ? Another weak attempt at counterplay. Black now has a winning 1.3 advantage according to the GK computer.
moves.20. Qf2: ? A mistake best was Qd2 with a 1.38 deficit according to the GK computer. This leads to a quick end.
moves.21. Nxa4: ? A serious blunder but White was already lost. Ba1 holds on for a while.
moves.21... Qxa4 22. Rfc1 Ng4: Black cannot prevent major loss of material.
